productText.text: Prego® Spicy Red Pepper Italian Sauce will definitely fire up the flavor in your favorite Italian dishes. Enjoy over pasta or as part of your favorite recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Spicy Red Pepper Italian Sauce will definitely fire up the flavor in your favorite Italian dishes. Enjoy over pasta or as part of your favorite recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Spicy Red Pepper Italian Sauce will definitely fire up the flavor in your favorite Italian dishes. Enjoy this bold and spicy sauce over pasta or as part of family-pleasing recipes.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Spicy Red Pepper Italian Sauce will definitely fire up the flavor in your favorite Italian dishes. Enjoy this bold and spicy sauce over pasta or as part of family-pleasing recipes.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
